## Linear Regression

```{r}
estimate_coefs_slr <- function(x, y, intercept, data){
  x.bar <- mean(x)
  x.sd <- sd(x)
  y.bar <- mean(y)
  y.sd <- sd(y)
  n <- length(x)
  
  r <- (sum((x-x.bar)*(y-y.bar)))/((n-1)*x.sd*y.sd)
  
  if(intercept){
    
    b1 <- r*(y.sd/x.sd)
    b0 <- y.bar - b1*x.bar
    
  } else {
    
    b0 <- 0
    b1 <- sum(x*y)/sum(x*x)
    
  }
  
  return(c(b0, b1))
}
```
